message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $11,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, especially considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some more money. Would you be willing to consider $9,500?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  While $9,500 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle at $10,250?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my target. Would you be willing to go down to $9,800?
